src:
Menteri Kesehatan dr.Terawan Pilih Ayam Penyet Saat Makan di Kantin Kemenkes
01 Nov 2019, 02:45 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Foto: Twitter

Jakarta - Menteri Kesehatan (Menkes), dr Terawan membagikan aktivitasnya di media sosial. Ia nampak asyik makan siang di kantin kantor Kementerian Kesehatan (Kemenkes).Di sela-sela padatnya aktivitas dr Terawan, ia sempatkan makan siang di kantin kantornya sendiri. Dalam video yang diunggah akun @arieflip di Twitter (31/10) tertulis keterangan, "Kantin Karyawan Kemenkes Heboh!!! Tadi siang Menkes Letjen TNI (Purn.) Dr. dr. Terawan Agus Putranto makan siang di Kantin."


Foto: Twitter

@arieflip juga menulis, "Ibu pemilik kantin sampai terharu keluar air mata karena sudah 30 tahun jualan baru kali ini Menkes makan di kantin." Video itu berdurasi sekitar 1 menit 30 detik.Nampak dr Terawan mengenakan batik berujar, "Saya saat ini sedang menikmati makanan luar biasa yang enak dan saya menikmatinya ada tempe, tahu, buah, ada proteinnya adalah ayam penyet." Mantan Kepala Rumah Sakit Pusat Angkatan Darat (RSPAD) Gatot Soebroto juga menambahkan, "Tidak lupa ada kerupuk karena itu ciri khas Indonesia."Baca Juga: Sepak Terjang dr Terawan, Kontroversi 'Cuci Otak' hingga Jadi Calon Menkes


Foto: Twitter

Ia yang ditemani sejumlah pegawai Kemenkes mengatakan rasa hidangan yang dicicipnya enak sekali dan ada di Kantin Sehat Kemenkes. Di tengah-tengah video dr Terawan juga berujar akan menraktir semua makan siang pegawai waktu itu."Karena saya disangoni istri saya. Dompetnya tadi pas saya diisi, kalo kosong ya tidak saya traktir," ujarnya berseloroh. Santap siang dr Terawan diakhiri dengan santap buah. "Saya menikmatinya sebagai bagian isi piringku," kata dokter yang lekat dengan terapi 'cuci otak' ini.Bukan jus, dr Terawan memilih potongan buah asli dalam olahan rujak yang segar. Ia pun tak segan melahap potongan bengkuang yang dicocol ke sambal rujak. "Salam sehat, Sehat Indonesia," pungkas dr Terawan.


Foto: Twitter

Baca Juga: Tegaskan Sikap Soal dr Terawan Jadi Menkes, Ketua IDI Sebut Ada Adu Domba Hingga berita ini dibuat, video dr Terawan sudah disaksikan lebih dari 30.900 kali. Netizen ramai memberi komentar soal dr Terawan. Salah satunya berbunyi, "Tipikal tentara, mau makan dimana saja oke. Harus diapresiasi kalo ada pimpinan yg mau makan semeja dgn bawahan. Bawahannya bangga lho kalo bisa makan semeja dgn pimpinannya."Ada juga netizen yang menuangkan harapannya pada dr Terawan. "Mudah" kesehatan rakyat lebih baik...ayo menkes buat Indonesia Sehat," sahut netizen lain.

text:
The Minister of Health dr.Terawan Selects the Penyet Chicken When Eating at the Ministry of Health Canteen
01 Nov 2019, 02:45 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Photo: Twitter

Jakarta - Minister of Health (Menkes), Dr. Terawan shared his activities on social media. He seemed to have lunch at the Ministry of Health (Kemenkes) office canteen. In the midst of the intense activity of Dr. Terawan, he took time to lunch at his own office canteen. In the video uploaded to the @arieflip account on Twitter (31/10), the statement said, "The Ministry of Health Ministry employees are hasty !!! This afternoon the Minister of Health Lieutenant General (Ret.) Dr. Dr. Terawan Agus Putranto had lunch in the Canteen."


Photo: Twitter

@arieflip also wrote, "The mother of the canteen owner was moved to tears because of 30 years of sales, this time the Minister of Health ate at the canteen." The video lasts about 1 minute 30 seconds. It appears from Terawan wearing batik saying, "I am currently enjoying a wonderfully delicious meal and I enjoy it there is tempeh, tofu, fruit, there is protein, it is chicken penyet." Former Head of the Central Army Hospital (RSPAD) Gatot Soebroto also added, "Do not forget there are crackers because it is characteristic of Indonesia." Also Read: Football Lunge from Terawan, the Controversy of 'Brainwashing' to Become a Prospective Minister of Health


Photo: Twitter

He who was accompanied by a number of Ministry of Health employees said the taste of the dishes he tasted was delicious and was in the Health Canteen of the Ministry of Health. In the middle of the video, Dr. Terawan also said that he would treat all the employees' lunches at that time. "Because I was cheated by my wife. The wallet was just when I filled it up, if it was empty, I wouldn't treat it," he joked. Dr. Terawan's lunch ended with a fruit meal. "I enjoyed it as part of the contents of my plate," said the doctor who is sticking with this 'brainwashing' therapy. Not juice, Dr. Terawan chose a piece of real fruit in a processed fresh salad. He did not hesitate to devour the chopped yam to chili sauce. "Greetings healthy, Healthy Indonesia," concluded Dr. Terawan.


Photo: Twitter

Also Read: Affirm the Attitude of the Problem from Terawan to the Minister of Health, the Chairperson of IDI Call There a Sheep Fighting Until this news was made, the video from Terawan has been watched more than 30,900 times. Netizens crowded to comment about Dr. Terawan. One of them reads, "Typical army, want to eat anywhere okay. Must be appreciated if there are leaders who want to eat at the table with subordinates. Subordinates are proud if you can eat at the table with their leaders." There are also netizens who pour their hopes on Dr. Terawan. "Easy" people's health is better ... let's get health for Indonesia Healthy, "said another netizen.




Check out the video "Taste of Arabic Cuisine Along Bangka Street, Banyuwangi"
